meanings.definition: To look for information or items by examining carefully
meanings.sent1: I will search the library for the book I need.
meanings.sent2: She likes to search online for new recipes to try.
meanings.sent3: The detective decided to search for clues in the old mansion.
meanings.sent4: His eyes searched the room, trying to find the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The explorer searched the jungle for rare plants.

meanings.definition: An act of searching for something
meanings.sent1: The search for the missing keys lasted all day.
meanings.sent2: The search for a new apartment can be challenging.
meanings.sent3: The search for the perfect gift was finally successful.
meanings.sent4: The search for the truth led to unexpected revelations.
meanings.sent5: The search for the lost dog ended happily.

meanings.definition: To try to find something by looking or asking
meanings.sent1: I will search the park for my missing sunglasses.
meanings.sent2: They decided to search the neighborhood for the lost cat.
meanings.sent3: The children searched high and low for their hidden Easter eggs.
meanings.sent4: She searched her memory for the name of the movie.
meanings.sent5: The team searched the forest for the rare bird species.
